dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Each and every photograph of Japanese
models showing Japanese street fashion on the app's introduction page is my
copyrighted work. It appears the app is 100% based on my copyrighted
material.

As a footnote, the app's logo also attempts to copy the style of the logo
of JapaneseStreets.com. The app even follows JapaneseStreets.com's
organization by using "boys," "girls" and "shows" (we use "guys, girls,
shows").

There is no uncertainty about the copyright of my photos and other
material. At the bottom of each page on JapaneseStreets.com the site's
copyright is clearly stated as "©2002-2012 JapaneseStreets."
